summary: This mod adds 4 new playable races to the game - the Daemons of Chaos from Warhammer Fantasy. They will use the skins of the daedra/creatures that are already in the game, but will add new spells, weapons, and more to make the race be like the Daemons of Chaos.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=Black][size=7]Daemons Of Chaos[/size][/color][/center]
[line]
[center][color=Black][size=4]by Soul Limit[/size][/color][/center]
[color=Black][size=3]Version :[/size][/color]ALPHA

[line]

[center][b][size=6][color=Crimson]Description[/color][/size][/b]
This mod adds 4 new playable races to the game - the Daemons of Chaos from Warhammer Fantasy.
[/center]
[line]

[center][b][size=6][color=Crimson]Races[/color][/size][/b]

4 new races:
- Daemon of Khorne
- Daemon Of Tzeentch
- Daemon of Slaanesh
- Daemon of Nurgle
[/center]
[line]

[center][b][size=6][color=Crimson]Spells[/color][/size][/b]

3 new groups of spells:

-Daemon Lore of Tzeentch:
- Flickering Fire of Tzeentch
- Boon Of Tzeentch
- Glean Magic
- Gift Of Chaos
- Bolt Of Change
- Tzeentch's Firestorm
-Daemon Lore of Nurgle
- Miasma of Pestilence
- Stream of Corruption
- Pit Of Slime
- Rancid Vistation
- Shrivelling Pox
- Plague Wind
-Daemon Lore of Slaanesh
[/center]
[line]
author: SoulLimit
